name: slate-auto-replace
description: A Slate plugin to automatically transform certain input.

scripts.build:max: mkdir -p ./dist && NODE_ENV=production browserify ./src/index.js --transform babelify --transform envify --transform [ browserify-global-shim --global ] --standalone SlateAutoReplace > ./dist/slate-auto-replace.js
scripts.build:min: mkdir -p ./dist && NODE_ENV=production browserify ./src/index.js --transform babelify --transform envify --transform [ browserify-global-shim --global ] --transform uglifyify --standalone SlateAutoReplace | uglifyjs > ./dist/slate-auto-replace.min.js
scripts.prepublish: yarn run build:max && yarn run build:min
